business.headline: Should you avoid smallcap, midcap stocks amid ongoing market correction?One of the primary reasons behind this downturn is the steep valuations of smallcap and midcap stocks, which analysts believe had reached unsustainable levels.

New India Co-operative Bank's financial operations halted after notice from RBIThe Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has restricted Mumbai-based New India Co-operative Bank from issuing loans, accepting deposits, or permitting withdrawals for six months. The move comes amid concerns over the bank's financial health and liquidity.

Although the central bank did not provide specific details, it stated that these directions were issued to protect depositors' interests.

Can a married couple save more taxes using both old and new tax regime?Married couples need to determine which tax regime offers lower tax liability for each spouse considering their income structure and deductions.

India's retail inflation dips to 4.31% in January, hits a five-month lowThe country's retail inflation witnessed a drop in January majorly due to declining food prices, according to data released by the National Statistics Office on Wednesday.

Sensex, Nifty recover sharply but end in red; M&M falls 3%The S&P BSE Sensex settled 122.52 points lower at 76,171.08. Earlier in the day, the 30-share index had plunged 850 points. Nifty, too, recovered strongly to end 26.55 points lower at 23,045.25.

Mutual fund inflows see slight dip in January. Here's whyThe flows declined 3.6% month-on-month to 396.88 billion rupees ($4.57 billion) from 411.56 billion rupees in December 2024, according to data by the Association of Mutual Funds in India (AMFI).

entertainment.headline: South Korean actor Kim Sae-ron, 24, found deadSouth Korean actor Kim Sae-ron, known for her roles in Bloodhounds and The Man from Nowhere, was found dead at her home in Seoul. She was 24. Authorities are investigating the circumstances of her death, with no signs of foul play reported yet.

The White Lotus S3 review: Predictable? Yes. Addictive? Also, yesReleased-Mon Feb 17, 2025The White Lotus Season 3 review: The White Lotus returns with a new season set in Thailand, offering a fresh cultural backdrop while retaining its biting satire on the ultra-rich. The series continues to entertain with its dark humour and ensemble cast, though its formula is starting to feel familiar. Read our full review.

Kanye West says he fought 5 hours for Grammy tickets amid guest list confusionRapper Kanye West, in a post on X, revealed that he fought for five hours to secure Grammy tickets amid guest list chaos. This comes amid claims that Kanye arrived at the event uninvited.

Comedian Anubhav Bassi's Lucknow show cancelled after warning over foul languageThe shows of comedian Anubhav Singh Bassi in Lucknow were cancelled due to concerns over inappropriate content, following a complaint by the UP Women's Commission vice-chairperson. Authorities cited potential law and order issues as reasons for the cancellation.

Watch: Chum Darang blushes as Karan Veer confesses love on Valentine's DayKaran Veer Mehra confessed his love for Chum Darang on Valentine's Day. Chum shared a post from their romantic outing on social media.
Watch: Ed Sheeran pauses Delhi concert as fan faints, wears Team India jerseyEd Sheeran wrapped up his India tour in Gurugram on February 15. He paused his concert briefly to help a fan who fainted.

Shalin Bhanot reacts to India's Got Latent Row, advocates self-disciplineTV actor Shalin Bhanot has reacted to the controversy surrounding YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia's comment on India's Got Latent during the FDCI's India Men's Weekend in Jaipur. He emphasised self-discipline and responsibility.

Today is a victory: Jay-Z reacts after rape lawsuit against him droppedIn a significant legal victory, rapper Jay-Z has seen a sexual assault lawsuit against him dismissed. The rapper and entrepreneur expressed relief and satisfaction over the court's decision.

No one can save him: Mahabharat actor threatens Ranveer Allahbadia Actor Saurav Gurjar openly threatened Ranveer Allahbadia over his recent remarks on India's Got Latent. In a video message, the actor requested the government to take strict action against the podcaster.

Released on Valentine's Day, the album in collaboration with PartyNextDoor marks his first new work since the Super Bowl halftime show.

Bharti Singh supports Samay Raina amid India's Got Latent controversyComedian Bharti Singh supported Samay Raina amid the India's Got Latent controversy. The comedian praised Samay and said that he is very sweet, and anyone can become his fan once they get to meet him.

Women's panel summons Elvish Yadav over remarks against Chum Darang on Feb 17YouTuber Elvish Yadav has been summoned by a women's panel following his racist remarks against Chum Darang. Yadav criticised her name and nationality, sparking courage among northeastern citizens.

general news.headline: 4.0 magnitude quake jolts Delhi-NCR, strong tremors felt across regionA 4.0 magnitude earthquake hit Delhi-NCR early on Monday with its epicentre in the national capital. The tremors lasted for a few seconds and caused panic among residents.

Sikh deportees seen without turbans in viral video, top religious body slams USA controversy erupted after Sikh deportees from the US were seen without their turbans at the Amritsar airport. The SGPC and Shiromani Akali Dal slammed the US authorities for allegedly not allowing the Sikh deportees to wear their turbans.

BJP likely to announce Delhi Chief Minister on February 19: SourcesOut of 48 BJP legislators who won in the recently-concluded Delhi Assembly elections, 15 names have been shortlisted -- nine will be selected for key posts of the Chief Minister, state cabinet ministers and the Speaker -- according to sources.

Unusual sound, scariest thing ever experienced: Delhi residents after quake scareEarthquake in Delhi: A strong earthquake measuring 4.0 on the Richter scale jolted Delhi and its adjoining National Capital Region at around 5.35 am on Monday. As per the National Center for Seismology, the epicentre was near Durgabai Deshmukh College of Special Education in Dhaula Kuan.

Why did Delhi's 4.0 earthquake feel stronger than it was?Strong tremors jolted Delhi-NCR residents out of sleep on Monday morning due to a 4.0 magnitude earthquake that shook buildings and left people terrified. But, was the earthquake as strong as it felt?

Man trying to exit station due to overcrowding lost 7-year-old in Delhi stampedeSeven-year-old Riya was among the 18 people killed in the stampede at New Delhi Railway Station on Saturday. She was trying to leave the station with her parents after they decided to call off their journey due to the rush.

DK Shivakumar bats for Siddaramaiah despite rumbles of leadership changeKarnataka Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar urged Congress members to avoid misusing Chief Minister Siddaramaiah's name or creating media controversies amid leadership speculation.

Stay calm, be alert for possible aftershocks: PM after quake rocks Delhi-NCRPrime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday urged the residents of Delhi-NCR region to stay calm and follow safety protocols, barely two hours after a 4.0 magnitude earthquake hit the national capital.

The party has not yet announced its candidate for the chief ministerial post, but sources say an announcement is likely soon.

Sivakarthikeyan turns 39: Kamal Haasan, Sudha Kongara wish actor on birthdayTamil superstar Sivakarthikeyan is celebrating his 39th birthday on February 17. To make the occasion even more special, Kamal Haasan and director Sudha Kongara extended heartfelt wishes on social media.

Sivakumar, Suriya and Karthi's family make rare public appearance. Pics and videosLegendary actor Sivakumar's family, including Suriya, Karthi, their spouses and children, got together for the inauguration of the new Agaram Foundation office in Chennai. sports.headline: Not dissimilar to Jasprit Bumrah: Ex-captain defends Aussie spinner's bowling actionFormer Australia captain Tim Paine jumped to the defence of Matt Kuhnemann, claiming that the spinner has a similar action to that of Jasprit Bumrah. Kuhnemann was reported for suspect action after the Sri Lanka Test series.

Shakib and Mahmudullah's twin centuries helped the Tigers chase down 266 with 16 balls to spare.

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.
